Sources & further info (mostly gathered by the great Nick Miller):

It gets real in this episode.

Owning an NBA team - https://x.com/parsons_tor

Owen Williams' article on "The Mystery of St. Brides": https://flexiblehead.blog/2014/02/16/st-brides-school/

An excellent BBC podcast about St. Brides: https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m001dd9t

"Encyclopedia Aristasiana": https://web.archive.org/web/20030801100917/http://aristasia.com/glossary.html 

"Daughters of Shining Harmony", which contrary to what I said in the video, does not seem to be online anymore:
https://web.archive.org/web/20180805032309/https://www.daughtersofshiningharmony.com/introductory/ 

There are a handful of Aristasia-related web pages still accessible without the Internet Archive, but beware before you do your own research - a lot of the links have been taken over by malware. Nothing super dangerous, as far as I'm aware, but I still get annoying pop-ups on my laptop after doing research for this episode.
